hero.title: HypnotherapyChangeYourMind
hero.subtitle1: transform your mind, heal your soul
hero.description: We help people release emotional blockages, overcome fears, and transform their lives through therapeutic hypnosis, safely, respectfully, and effectively.

whatIsHypnotherapy.title: What is Hypnotherapy?
whatIsHypnotherapy.p1: Hypnotherapy is the science that studies the subconscious mind, the origins, and behavioral patterns that affect our daily lives. In hypnotherapy, we don't work with problems or illnesses; we work with the thoughts, attitudes, and behaviors that create problems and illnesses.
whatIsHypnotherapy.p2: Hypnotherapy goes hand in hand with Neurogenesis, allowing us to reconstruct thought patterns to break habits, acquire new skills and ideas, and improve your quality of life.

servicesPreview.title: Featured Services
servicesPreview.description: Explore some of our services designed for your inner healing and transformation.
servicesPreview.pastLifeDesc: Access memories from past lives to find clarity, healing, and purpose.
servicesPreview.pastLifeBanner: Discover the secrets of your soul.
servicesPreview.anxietyDesc: Free yourself from daily pressure and find your inner peace with effective techniques.
servicesPreview.phobiaDesc: Conquer your irrational fears (public speaking, flying, etc.) and live without limits.
servicesPreview.phobiaBanner: Conquer your fears, unleash your potential.

testimonialsPreview.title: Success Stories
testimonialsPreview.description: Our unique methodology, focused on neurogenesis to reorganize neural pathways, has transformed lives.
testimonialsPreview.client1Content: Hypnotherapy helped me understand patterns that had no explanation in this life. A revealing experience!
testimonialsPreview.client2Content: I was able to overcome my anxiety and now I feel more confident and in control in my daily life. Totally recommended!
testimonialsPreview.client3Content: Quitting smoking was easier than I imagined thanks to these sessions. My health has improved incredibly!

cta.title: Do you feel like you're carrying unexplained fears or patterns?
cta.p1: Through guided regression, we access memories from previous lives to find clarity, healing, and purpose.
cta.p2: 1.5-hour session for $150. Book your consultation with $75, and the rest on the day of the session.
